00050     ///////////////////////////////////
00051     // ActorBase class fuctions
00052     ActorBase::ActorBase (String name, String file, String group, World* _World)
00053     {
00054         this->GameWorld = _World;
00055         this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00056         this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(this->node);
00057         this->MotionState = new internal::PhysMotionState(this->node);
00058         this->Shape = new btEmptyShape();
00059         this->CreateEntity(name, file, group);
00060         ActorSounds = NULL;
00061         Animation = NULL;
00062         ShapeIsSaved = false;
00063         ActorType = ActorBase::Actorbase;
00064     }
00065 
00066     ActorBase::~ActorBase ()
00067     {
00068         delete MotionState;
00069         if(!ShapeIsSaved)
00070         {
00071             delete Shape;
00072         };
00073         delete node;
00074         delete entity;
00075         if(CollisionObject)
00076         {
00077             delete CollisionObject;
00078         }
00079     }
00080 
00081     ///////////////////////////////////
00082     // ActorBase Private misc functions
00083     btTriangleMesh* ActorBase::CreateTrimesh() const
00084     {
00085         // Get the mesh from the entity
00086         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00087 
00088         // Get the submesh and associated data
00089         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00090         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00091         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00092 
00093         // Get the position element
00094         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00095 
00096         // Get a pointer to the vertex buffer
00097         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00098 
00099         // Get a pointer to the index buffer
00100         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00101 
00102         // Get the number of triangles
00103         unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00104 
00105         // Allocate space for the vertices and indices
00106         Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00107         unsigned long* indices  = new unsigned long[indexData->indexCount];
00108 
00109         // Lock the vertex buffer (READ ONLY)
00110         unsigned char* vertex =   static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00111         float* pReal = NULL;
00112         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00113         {
00114             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00115             Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00116             vertices[j] = pt;
00117         }
00118         vBuffer->unlock();
00119         size_t index_offset = 0;
00120         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00121 
00122         // Lock the index buffer (READ ONLY)
00123         unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00124         unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00125 
00126         if (use32bitindexes)
00127         {
00128             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00129             {
00130                 indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00131             }
00132         }
00133         else
00134         {
00135             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00136             {
00137                 indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00138             }
00139         }
00140         iBuffer->unlock();
00141 
00142         // We now have vertices and indices ready to go
00143 
00144         // The Bullet triangle mesh
00145         btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00146 
00147         // Setup the tri mesh
00148         btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00149         int i=0;
00150 
00151         // For every triangle
00152         for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00153         {
00154             // Set each vertex
00155             vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00156             vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00157             vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00158 
00159             // Add it into the trimesh
00160             trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00161 
00162             // Increase index count
00163             i+=3;
00164         }
00165         delete[] vertices;
00166         delete[] indices;
00167 
00168         return trimesh;
00169     }

00187     void ActorBase::SetOgreLocation (Vector3 Location)
00188     {
00189         this->node->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00190     }
00191 
00192     Vector3 ActorBase::GetOgreLocation() const
00193     {
00194         Vector3 temp;
00195         temp.ExtractOgreVector3(this->node->getPosition());
00196         return temp;
00197     }
00198 
00199     void ActorBase::SetBulletLocation (Vector3 Location)
00200     {
00201         //btTransform* temp = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00202         this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00203     }
00204 
00205     Vector3 ActorBase::GetBulletLocation() const
00206     {
00207         Vector3 temp;
00208         //btTransform trans = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00209         temp.ExtractBulletVector3(this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().getOrigin());
00210         return temp;
00211     }

00271     ///////////////////////////////////
00272     // ActorBase Public Misc Functions
00273 
00274     void ActorBase::AttachToGraphics ()
00275     {
00276         Vector3 tempv;
00277         Quaternion tempq;
00278         tempv = GetBulletLocation();
00279         tempq.ExtractBulletQuaternion(CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().getRotation());
00280         this->node->setPosition(tempv.GetOgreVector3());
00281         this->node->setOrientation(tempq.GetOgreQuaternion());
00282         this->node->attachObject(this->entity);
00283     }
00284 
00285     void ActorBase::DetachFromGraphics ()
00286     {
00287         this->node->detachObject(this->entity);
00288     }

00291     {
00292         return this->entity->getName();
00293     }

00317     void ActorBase::SetAnimation(String &AnimationName, bool Loop)
00318     {
00319         if(this->IsAnimated())
00320         {
00321             Animation->setEnabled(false);
00322         }
00323         Animation = entity->getAnimationState(AnimationName);
00324         Animation->setLoop(Loop);
00325     }
00326 
00327     void ActorBase::EnableAnimation(bool Enable)
00328     {
00329         if(Animation)
00330         {
00331             Animation->setEnabled(Enable);
00332         }
00333     }
00334 
00335     bool ActorBase::IsAnimated()
00336     {
00337         if(Animation)
00338         {
00339             return Animation->getEnabled();
00340         }else{
00341             return false;
00342         }
00343     }
00344 
00345     void ActorBase::AdvanceAnimation(Real Time)
00346     {
00347         if(Animation)
00348         {
00349             Animation->addTime(Time);
00350         }
00351     }
00352 
00353     void ActorBase::RemoveSetAnimation()
00354     {
00355         if(Animation)
00356         {
00357             Animation->setEnabled(false);
00358             Animation = NULL;
00359         }
00360     }
